article_title: How is Oscar, the hipster health insurance company, performing?

twitter.description: It’s mid-December, which means Oscar, a Web-savvy health insurance startup backed by $150 million in venture capital, is back in business. Health insurance can only be sold during “open enrollm...

article_metadata.description: The New York company promises a trouble-free experience. Eighteen months in, it's still learning.
